import{fromJS}from"immutable";import*as constants from"./constants";var defaultState=fromJS({title:"",content:"",imageUrl:"",username:"",editStatus:0//0 無  // 1 編輯模式   2 編輯結束
});export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case constants.CHANGE_DETAIL:return state.merge({title:action.title,content:action.content,imageUrl:action.imageUrl,username:action.username});case constants.CHANGE_DETAIL_EDIT_STATUS:return state.set("editStatus",action.editStatus);default:return state;}});
